html:
Dec 3 (Reuters) - 3I Infrastructure PLC 3IN.L:: *3I INFRASTRUCTURE - FURTHER INVESTMENT IN ESVAGT *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - AGREED TO ACQUIRE STAKE IN ESVAGT OWNED BY ITS CO-INVESTOR AMP CAPITAL *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - THIS FURTHER INVESTMENT IS EXPECTED TO BE £268 MILLION *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - THIS WILL RESULT IN 3I INFRASTRUCTURE HOLDING 100% OF EQUITY IN ESVAGT. *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - 3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC INVESTS A FURTHER £268 MILLION IN ESVAGT *3I INFRASTRUCTURE PLC - COMPLETION IS SUBJECT TO CERTAIN THIRD PARTY CONSENTS AND IS EXPECTED TO TAKE PLACE IN Q1 OF 2022


((Reuters Investor Briefs; email: reutersinvestor.briefs@thomsonreuters.com)) Source Date/Time = 03-DEC-202111:34:20.467 GMT
